IPCC 4th Assessment Report (2007): Model IPSL-CM4; Scenario SRA1B; Variable psl

Location: DDC Home > Models: Summary Data > AR4 (2007): SRES scenarios
Source file: IPCM4_SRA1B_1_G_psl_1-2772.grb
Period covered by experiment: 2000 to 2230

Individual files can be downloaded from the "data" links; the "Lon180" links provide the same data with the grid cycled so that the first longitude is 180W
